title: Veggie Cobb Salad
directions: Build your salad in a large bowl or plate starting with a layer of romaine. Top with shredded carrot, broccoli, cauliflower, tomato, kidney beans, egg, avocado and crumbled blue cheese. Dress with a few splashes of red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper. Drizzle broccoli and cauliflower with ranch dressing if desired.
ingredients: 1/2 cup of Bush's Best Red Kidney Beans, rinsed and drained
couple splashes of red wine vinegar
salt and black pepper to taste
